backend/main.mo: Defines core data types for books, meditation sessions, journaling, user profile, rituals, and progress, and initializes a static list of recommended books.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature‑tracking metadata including feature descriptions, affected files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of major frontend files describing their purpose and behavior for build planning.
frontend/index.css: Defines global OKLCH theme color tokens, light/dark variables, and base Tailwind resets for consistent styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point with root mount element and script loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes, React Query client, theme provider, Internet Identity provider, and global Toaster before rendering the app.
frontend/src/components/AmbientMusicCaro: Component providing a swipeable ambient‑music selector with looping audio playback, mute/volume control, and carousel navigation.
frontend/src/components/FeatureCard.tsx: Empty file placeholder with no implementation provided.
frontend/src/components/FloatingNav.tsx: Floating side navigation with animated icons and hover labels linking to Journal, Progress, and Books pages.
frontend/src/components/HamburgerMenu.ts: Mobile menu component with theme toggle, authentication-aware actions, and logout handling that clears cached queries.
frontend/src/components/lotus-r3f/LotusM: Three.js lotus model that animates petals, glow, and breathing based on growth state and theme.
frontend/src/components/lotus-r3f/LotusP: Three.js particle system that switches between chaotic and coherent motion patterns depending on lotus growth state.
frontend/src/components/LotusCanvas.tsx: Canvas animation rendering particles and a pulsing lotus with theme- and variant-based visual intensity.
frontend/src/components/MeditationCarous: Swipeable carousel for selecting meditation types with circular navigation and centered scaling effects.
frontend/src/components/MeditationGuideS: Step-by-step meditation guide with swipe navigation, animated transitions, and optional benefits parsing.
frontend/src/components/MobileBackButton: Mobile-only back button that navigates users to the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/ProgressBowl.tsx: Canvas-based progress visualization drawing a glowing bowl with animated liquid fill based on total minutes.
frontend/src/components/ProgressLotusR3F: 3D lotus progress visualization using React Three Fiber, with lights, particle effects, and growth state rendering.
frontend/src/components/ProgressLotusSVG: Animated SVG lotus that reacts to growth state, streak, and theme with breathing, pulsing glow, and layered petals.
frontend/src/components/QuizDialog.tsx: Interactive multi‑step quiz dialog that scores answers to recommend a meditation type and returns the result on completion.
frontend/src/components/SavedRitualsCaro: Carousel UI for browsing, starting, and deleting saved rituals with swipe support and delete confirmation.
frontend/src/components/SessionIndicator: Displays login or guest status and provides logout or return‑to‑start actions while clearing cached queries on logout.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for meditation data, quotes, sessions, and guest-mode storage using the backend actor when available.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind styles, color variables, themes, and custom animations for the app.
frontend/src/lib/bookData.ts: Exports a list of recommended meditation books with metadata and Amazon links.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
Empty page file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/BookRecommendationsPa: Renders an interactive swipeable book carousel with theming, navigation, and decorative UI elements.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard with theme toggle, daily quotes, meditation selection, rituals management, and navigation to pre‑meditation flow.
frontend/src/pages/JournalPage.tsx: Journal interface supporting search, filtering, editing, favorites, deletion, and data import/export.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing screen with login, guest mode, theme toggle, and redirect logic for authenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/PreMeditationPage.tsx: Pre‑session setup page offering meditation guides, mood/energy inputs, ambient sound options, and ritual saving.
frontend/src/pages/ProgressPage.tsx: Progress tracking UI showing streaks, minutes, ranks, and options to export or import meditation data.
frontend/src/utils/lotusGrowthModel.ts: Computes lotus growth parameters based on total meditation minutes, mapping phases and smooth interpolations to visual states for a multi‑layer bloom model.
frontend/src/utils/meditationStorage.ts: Manages guest‑mode meditation data in localStorage, including journals, progress tracking, rituals, and legacy key migration.
frontend/src/utils/progressRanks.ts: Defines rank tiers for total meditation minutes and provides helpers to get current/next rank and minutes until advancing.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters (including hash‑based), persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing sensitive params from the URL.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, shadows, animations, and container settings with OKLCH‑based custom design tokens.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s feature inventory and metadata summarizing app functionality, authentication, storage, UI, and backend capabilities.
